name: Ay Pinatas! -- Prototype
description:
This is my post-competition version (a.k.a. prototype) of my Ludum Dare entry "Ay Pinatas!"

Your goal is to get rid as much evil pinatas as possible and then find the exit. Collect candies for health, but don't eat too many!

Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD = move
  • Z or L keys = swing sweeper

Because this game is a prototype, only one level is available. I might make more updates to this prototype in the future. So be sure to keep in touch on the changes.

You can check out my Ludum Dare version here.
